summary: The customer was inquiring about Contoso Wireless’ internet product and the payment options. The customer service representative explained that they offer a flat rate of $59.99 per month when you pay with a credit card and an annual rate of $559.99 with a 10% discount. They also offer additional discounts for long-term customers and loyalty program members. Finally, they have a promotional offer where customers who purchase the internet product and sign up for a two-year contract can receive an additional 5% discount off the annual rate.
